Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Travis Isom
Reviews.Content: First off this phone is simply amazing it has all the features of newer cell phones for less the dollar amount. Second dont be fooled with all the negativity that surrounds this phone, most of the negative remarks are from non Windows Mobiles user. Third the seller should not be forgotten for providing a great product at the lowest price around and fast shipping. Also I didnt list any features simply because there are so many.

Reviews.Title: LG CT810= Meh...
Reviews.Author: Beep
Reviews.Content: I only had to wait a short while to get the product- when I got it the side was popped out- I had to press on it pretty hard to pop it back in- sometimes when I use it the screen flips randomly- and when using the touch screen there are these weird white lines that follow my finger...Never had a touchscreen before- overall it was okay, I mean I did not spend a fortune on it- so I got what I paid for... I ended up giving it to my sister after a few days of fooling with it...

Reviews.Title: LG CT810
Reviews.Author: Wagner La Paz
Reviews.Content: LG CT810 is an economical alternative among smart phones. Its sleek design and Windows mobile phone makes this a useful tool.Their tools include the GPS that works very well with google maps, FM receiver and camera.A disadvantage is speed, the touch screen is slow at times.

ProductInfo.Features:
Compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T;/T-Mobile. Not all carrier features supported. Does not work with CDMA carriers
Business-oriented smartphone with Windows Mobile 6.1 OS, Wi-Fi networking, and 3-inch touchscreen
Tri-mode 3G-connectivity; compatible with AT&T; Navigator GPS turn-by-turn directions, AT&T; Mobile Music, Video Share service, and Mobile Banking
3-mp camera/camcorder;Bluetooth stereo music streaming;MicroSD expansion to 32 GB;direct push email;access to instant messaging;digital media player
Up to 8.7 hours of talk time, up to 504 hours ( 21 days) of standby time
ProductInfo.Name: LG CT810 Unlocked GSM Mobile Phone
